Package org.ejbca.configdump.ejb

Interface ConfigdumpSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConfigdumpSessionLocal, ConfigdumpSessionRemote
    public interface ConfigdumpSession
    Interface for exporting (and the future, importing) data with Configdump.
    Version:
    $Id: ConfigdumpSession.java 28387 2018-02-27 09:12:37Z aminkh $

    • Field Detail

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • performExport

        ConfigdumpExportResult performExport​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                     ConfigDumpSetting setting)
                              throws ConfigdumpException,
                                     IOException,
                                     AuthorizationDeniedException
        Exports EJBCA data, except for keys and certificates, to a set of YAML files. One YAML file is created per "item" in the database (e.g. a certificate profile).
        Parameters:
        admin - Authentication token of the requesting admin (for the Configdump CLI, this is a CLI authentication token).
        setting - Settings such as export directory, and items to include in the export
        Returns:
        Result object. In case errors are set to be ignored, then this contains a list of errors.
        Throws:
        ConfigdumpException - If an error occurs, which was not ignored.
        IOException - On failure to create the YAML files etc.
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail
